context.setting: peaceful forest near a village with a large banyan tree
context.plot: A flock of birds resting in a banyan tree becomes tangled in a hunter's net. Mina the little mouse hears their cries and hurries over; while the birds flutter and distract the hunter, Mina uses her sharp teeth to gnaw a hole in the net. Together they free themselves and return safely to the tree, promising to help one another in the future.
context.moral_lesson: Working together and helping each other can solve problems no one can fix alone.
